nodes.label: message
nodes.text: Hello Person1,    Sharing a picture of my abdomen some 40 days after starting on the heparin. In addition to the bruising, I probably have 20+ hematoma under the skin. This is both uncomfortable and painful. Would like to switch back to Eliquis. Thanks,  Person2
